entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Becoming mainly cloudy late in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
